- What changed?
- Why?

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Documentation

## Validation

- [ ] Backend tests (`cd backend && PYTHONPATH=. ./venv/bin/pytest`)
- [ ] Frontend lint (`cd frontend && npm run lint`)
- [ ] Frontend build (`cd frontend && npm run build`)

## Risk and Impact

- Breaking changes? If yes, explain.
- Migration required? If yes, explain rollout/rollback.
- Any impact on attribution or research claims?
